thread.title_full: Comment on The Flaming Lips and Miley Cyrus reunite on “We A Family” — listen by Shite alert

author: Shite alert
title: Comment on The Flaming Lips and Miley Cyrus reunite on “We A Family” — listen by Shite alert

organizations.name: sgt. pepper’s lonely hearts club band

text:
Reddit 
A partnership that once seemed far-fetched has since morphed into a regular collaboration, as The Flaming Lips have again teamed up with Miley Cyrus on a new single titled “We A Family”. Cyrus, who previously appeared on The Flaming Lips’ 2014 tribute to Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club Band and teamed up with Wayne Coyne for her fifth studio album, 2015’s Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz , lends guest vocals to the track. Check it out below, or download it via iTunes . 
“We A Family” will appear as the album closer on Oczy Mlody , The Flaming Lips’ forthcoming album scheduled for release on January 13th. Their 16th effort to date also serves as their first full-length of original material since The Terror in 2013. As part of the build-up to the track’s release, The Future Heart posted a video from the recording session. Sessions for @TheFlamingLips new LP "Oczy Mlody" closing track "We A Famly" feat @MileyCyrus https://t.co/AniI4KGELi https://t.co/A265V1PDW3 pic.twitter.com/RygrHZzUHH 
— The Future Heart (@TheFutureHeart) January 5, 2017
